title:Erky's DIM Wishlist.
description:These are my personal favorites or aspirational weapon rolls for MnK and mostly (but not exclusively) PVE. Your mileage may vary.

// Ignition Code
//notes:Looking for barrels increasing velocity with no downsides, Spike/Blinding + Slideshot + Vorpal or Demolitionist. Recommended MW: Velocity/Handling.|tags:pve
